description: Pan suffers a heart attack, and Goku Jr. believes that he might be able to save her with the power of the 4 star Dragon Ball. Along with the school bully, he tries to find the ball... and unleashes his hidden bravery and power.

titles.title: Gokuu Gaiden! Yuuki no Akashi wa Sixingqiu
La Legendaria Esfera de Cuatro Estrellas
悟空外伝! 勇気の証しは四星球(スーシンチュウ)
